title: ~ 2bd - Hill Country views - Great price - 15 mins to Downtown
posting_body: 🏠 This is a spacious and well laid out 2bd in a beautiful Southwest Austin community.
Only a short 15 min drive into the heart of Austin.
~ Parking is included in the rent
~ This is a very functional layout with tons of living room space.
Bedrooms are separated which is a great layout for roommates or having a home office.
This community has top of the line amenities; beautiful pool overlooking the hill country, nice gym, and tons of community spaces to lounge or work from home.
This community is in Southwest Austin only a 15 min drive to heart of Downtown.
Mins away from HEB, coffee shops, Greenbelt, tons of dining & local eclectic austin bars.
😄 I'm a licensed Apartment locator and get paid by the properties so my service is 100% free.
I have been doing this job for over 5 years.
I love what I do and my goal is to make your apartment search as easy and smooth as possible.
Don't hesitate to text or call me and use my knowledge of Austin's market to assure you get a great deal on your next apartment.
